etymology.description: phonetic: 冎 (guǒ, "protect") + semantic: 口 (kǒu, "mouth") = combined to suggest something related to oral or vocal function
etymology.interpretation: The character 咼(咼) (guō, "pot") combines 冎(冎) (guǒ) as its phonetic component with 口(口) (kǒu, "mouth") as its semantic component. While 'pot' is its current meaning, the combination suggests an original usage related to containing or vocal sound, which may have evolved over time.
